com.octo.android.robospice.persistence

Interface Persister

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GsonObjectPersister, GsonObjectPersisterFactory, GsonObjectPersisterFactory, InDatabaseObjectPersister, InDatabaseObjectPersisterFactory, InFileBigInputStreamObjectPersister, InFileInputStreamObjectPersister, InFileObjectPersister, InFileObjectPersisterFactory, InFileStringObjectPersister, Jackson2ObjectPersisterFactory, JacksonObjectPersister, JacksonObjectPersisterFactory, JacksonObjectPersisterFactory, JsonObjectPersister, JsonObjectPersisterFactory, ObjectPersister, ObjectPersisterFactory, SimpleSerializerObjectPersister, SimpleSerializerObjectPersisterFactory, SpringAndroidObjectPersister

    public interface Persister
    This interface defines the common behavior of all elements inside the CacheManager bus.
    Author:
    sni

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHandleClass(Class<?> clazz)
      Whether or not this bus element can persist/unpersist objects of the given class clazz.

    • Method Detail

      • canHandleClass

        boolean canHandleClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Whether or not this bus element can persist/unpersist objects of the given class clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of objets we are looking forward to persist.
        Returns:
        true if this bus element can persist/unpersist objects of the given class clazz. False otherwise.
